label: [filter] narrowband no topic
info:
## Filter - narrow band mode

mode `narrowbandEq` no topic

name: even if the first 20 is blocked, it sets the new value and hence the second and third 20 values are passed through
this is using the output valid and the 10 is set and the 20 does not reset that value hence only the 10 payloads are being passed through
an initial value of 15 prevents the initial value of 10, after that 10 is set as value
initial value is 30 as output value means that all values are initial out of band
negative values are treated absolutely - +/- so negative values are considered as positive values
narrowband - no initial value, 10% compared to input value, > || ==
narrowband - no initial value, 10% compared to output value, > || ==
narrowband - initial value 15, 10% compared to input value, > || ==
narrowband - initial value 30, 10% compared to output value, > || ==
narrowband - no initial value, 10% compared to input value, > || ==
